page.title: 20COUNTY DAY HARTHAM, HERTFORD
page.content: Held annually at{Hartham Park,}County Day is a chance to have a pleasant day out and raise money for charity.Spring Bank Holiday Monday is usually wet and this year was no exception but,despite the rain,{6000 people}paid to see the attractions. I got in free as I was on {Red Cross}duty, tending lost children and injuries. First I looked round the stalls, then we had a lot of accidents from the{fair}(cut fingers and knees). Crowds watched 5-a-side football and tug-o-war competitions, then the{mayor opened the main events in the arena. There were clowns, bands, majorettes and the K9 Commandos demonstrating dog training.Next came a{medieval jousting display from France but the thing that stole the show was the{skydivers}drop- ping in just as the weather cleared! Despite winds preventing the awaited balloon launch, the day was a success!
